amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-457 to strike the statutory requirement that the Pentagon provide annual Unfunded Priorities lists to Congress.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the statutory requirement that the Pentagon provide annual Unfunded Priorities lists to Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 173 - 241 (Roll no. 145).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jayapal.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 173 - 241 (Roll no. 145).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A005) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 173 - 241 (Roll no. 145).
